author: Andy Dufek
comment: As others have pointed out, app was buggy (forgetting settings) and when I replaced my old AW smartwatch with a new one, the Premium version doesn't seem to be found (which makes it seem like it's tied to the device, not the Google Play account).  Looks like it's been a while since an update, so I think this may have been abandoned.  Fortunately, there's a competing product with great reviews, so moving on...

author: Dave Angstrom
comment: This app used to work rather well. It kept the light on longer according to the value you would set. However, since the latest Android Wear update it is practically worthless. Every so often and for no obvious reason it will now shut down, leaving the light timeout at the default 5 seconds. Every time then you have to open the app and reselect the light timeout which is quite annoying.
title: Worthless after Wear update

author: Derek Quayle
comment: I was very happy when I found this app as the built-in light timeout is way too short. So I installed this app and thought problem solved. I set the timeout to 10 secs. What I noticed though that quite often the light would turn off much earlier -  as if I didn't have the app running at all. It happens randomly and makes having this app rather pointless unfortunately. Therefore I cannot recommend this to anyone looking for a solution to Wear's short backlight timeout.
title: Not good

comment: As other reviewers have pointed out, there is a general problem with the reliability of this app. For some time, it will work fine but then seemingly out of random the backlight turns off much earlier than the value that you have set. I wish the developer could address this problem and make this app as useful as promised.
title: Buggy

author: J T Cornett
comment: Exactly what I needed.  Too bad android wear doesn't do this by default,  but good for developer who created this app. Thanks!  I bought the upgrade. Only 99 cents!
title: Works great!

author: Patrick
comment: Finally I can see my beautiful watch face for more than 2 seconds.  This app saves the day.  Up to a minute of full bright face.
title: Thank u

author: Bubba Walsh
comment: I paid for Premium and had it for a short time now it's gone! I can't even find the upgrade option now. You took my money so give me my product

author: Tyrane Lewis
comment: I upgraded android wear and now I only get the free version....I purchased the full version and can't find it on play store either
title: Where did paid version go?

author: Ronald Cox
comment: Just installed on my Huawei Watch, and so far, it's working perfectly. If that changes, I'll come back and report.
title: So far, so good!

author: James Edmonds
comment: I was getting so tired of my screen during off after just 2 seconds! This app works just as described & I couldn't be more pleased!
title: Wear must have!

author: Steven Banton
comment: Does exactly what it says,  set it on 30 secs on my ticwatch E and it works a treat... now i can actually enjoy the beauty of my watch face .. thank you guys ..OH AND ITS FREE ..BONUS

author: Alasdair Hutchison
comment: At last a light extender that actually works. I've tried them all.  Brilliant on my Misfit Vapor

author: Jesse Deslauriers
comment: AMAZING  Just installed it on my Huawei watch. Takes a little time to set up but it works great!! Thanks InstextUs

author: Dave Gamer
comment: Works awesome! Makes my Huawei smartwatch face stay on for 1 min,  instead of 3 sec! Thx!

author: trevor tatam
comment: Timed to perfection, does what it says on the tin.
title: Spot on

comment: Very smart. Works perfect. But How to reset the time again? Couldnt find the setting.

author: Kendall Beister
comment: Did not work

author: Mark Gindin
comment: Changed settings immediately. Very good product.
title: Works

author: shashank chahal
comment: Works fine on my MOTO 360 2nd Gen

author: Keith Holmes
comment: Finally I can see my watchface!
title: Thanks!

author: Asit Singh
comment: Does the job as expected.
title: Good app

author: Samir Dhaga
comment: Worked pretty well on my Huawei

author: Greg Wagner
comment: Works great.  Does what it says it does.

author: Most Wanted
comment: Good job.
title: Perfect!!!

author: Al Pray
comment: Works perfectly!

comment: Does the job
title: Excellent

title: not worth it

comment: Worked great a few months ago. Wanted to use it again but now it won't show up on my huewei watch. Rysnc apps, reboot watch, nothing works.  Uninstalled
